entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests - Assertion failed: ClientCertificates. Expected enumerable cloned value. #71233
  • Microsoft.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Redist package support will end with .NET 6 #71231
    7.0.0
  • Azure Virtual Machine serial console - Process terminated error #71224
  • Enable arm64 atomics for standalone GC #71221
    7.0.0
  • Review usage of TARGET_XXX ifdefs #71220
    Future
  • `getSIMDStructFromField` is not resilient against struct reinterpretation #71219
    7.0.0
  • PGO: Assertion failed '(sizeDif == 4) || (sizeDif == 8)' #71217
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient.DefaultProxy doesn't understand socks when populated from an environment variable #71215
  • Json web benchmark doesn't benefit from PGO on Windows (it does on Linux) #71208
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: SO_PEERCRED support for Unix Domain Sockets #71207
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Sort<Int32> #71214
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] ReferenceError: SharedArrayBuffer is not defined. /p:WasmEnableThreads=true #71196
  • AndroidManifest can not be set to an absolute path #71195
  • add SslStreamCertificateContext to SslClientAuthenticationOptions #71194
  • JIT: BBF_HAS_NULLCHECK is not set on BB but is required #71193
    7.0.0
  • Add X509ChainPolicy to SslOptions #71191
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.ContentLengthReadStream should provide the length of the stream #71190
  • Unable to bind Dictionary with key type "Enum" when key string case is different #71185

Closed

  • Initial executable memory allocation on ARM64 Linux is not right #65900
  • TimeZoneInfo.GetUtcOffset returns different value on Windows and Linux #70813
  • PerfLabTests.LowLevelPerf.StaticDelegate has regressed on Linux x64 #67967
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalDirectiveException pops up when executing MetaFile automation case #69348
    7.0.0
  • Int128 type layout not compatible with native ABI on big-endian platforms #71212
  • Assert failure: heapSize >= initialRequestSize with collectible assemblies on linux-x64 #71200
    7.0.0
  • [Wasm][Threading] Task.Delay only continues after a GC #70571
    7.0.0
  • Math.Round(double,int,MidpointRounding) Math.Round(decimal,int,MidpointRounding) different result #71192
  • Slow first HTTP POST request #62129
    7.0.0
  • RegexOptions.Compiled impacts Android startup #71007
  • JIT: Faster Math.Max/Min for x64 #65625
    Future
  • NativeAOT when building shared library #71063
  • Error named pipes client Logon Failure: the user has not been granted the requested logon type at this computer. #70354
  • DI, AddHttpClient: configured HttpClient not resolved when registered in wrong order #71197
  • [API Proposal]: `Process.Architecture` or `Process.Is64Bit` #70374
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Array for ARM64 #68667
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect DateTimeFormat for nb-NO in Blazor WebAssembly #67115
    7.0.0
  • SerialPinChange.ToString() returns an integer value #69290
    Future
  • Conditional building of LINQ queries #71108
  • [wasm] `System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.CloseTest.CloseOutputAsync_ClientInitiated_CanReceive_CanClose` failing on browser #65796
    7.0.0
  • ﻿"Unable to load DLL 'libcups': The specified module could not be found." #65121
    Future
  • JIT ARM64: Assertion failed 'argValue->OperIsIndir()' during 'Morph - Global' #71118
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Unbox as Span<byte> #66934
    Future
  • Test failure Interop\\PInvoke\\Vector2_3_4\\Vector2_3_4\\Vector2_3_4.cmd #71179
  • [API Proposal]: APIs for working with unix file mode #67837
  • JIT: Libraries PGO assert during find loops #59666
    7.0.0
  • PGO: libraries test failure on x64 linux #59973
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\Regression\JitBlue\GitHub_21990\GitHub_21990\GitHub_21990.cmd #70263
    7.0.0
  • Publishing a NativeAOT app generates JSON files #63265
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Formats.Tar.Tests.TarWriter_WriteEntry_File_Tests.Add_File(format: Pax) #70060
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Formats.Tar.Tests.TarWriter_WriteEntry_File_Tests.Add_File(format: Gnu) #69474
    7.0.0
  • Invalid currency symbol for German and Chinese culture in Blazor WASM application #63045
  • runtime references some old packages that are no longer produced #69461
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark EnumerateMetafileProc's callbackData parameter as nullable #71239
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Custom marshallers v2 usage #71238
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Realign dcs with 48 implementation #71237
    area-Serialization
  • Enable hot/cold splitting of EH funclets #71236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing entrypoint breakpoint on release mode. #71235
    area-Debugger-mono
  • NonBacktracking locking fixes and cleanup #71234
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add SYSLIB0044 to diagnostic list #71232
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Obsolete Create(string) cryptographic factory methods #71230
    area-System.Security
  • Re-enable automatic gc safe transitions in threaded wasm mode #71229
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, area-Threading-mono
  • Add Regex span startat overloads #71228
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add `System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Heif` and `Webp`. #71227
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code from and fix `getSIMDStructFromField` #71226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add CET pipeline #71223
  • Fix 32-bit process module enumeration on 64-bit Windows (#70370) #71218
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Adding tests for Atan2Pi #71206
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove gather-write overload of QuicStream.WriteAsync #71204
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [DRAFT][MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono] Remove unused field in Exception.Mono #71202
  • [mono] Avoid transformation from multiplication to left shift in case of 64 bit value #71189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove SString ANSI representation. #71186
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: strengthen checking of the loop table #71184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-preview6] Fix size check for objects in heap walk #71183
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution, .NET
  • Refactor segment size computation #71178
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Try getting a crashdump for #70010 #71177
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expect UnauthorizedAccessException in tvOS if extracting fifo from tar without elevation #71175
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Fix manual delegate interop in System.Drawing.Common to handle nulls correctly. #71225
    area-System.Drawing, 7.0.0
  • Fixing Int128/UInt128 field order for s390x, ppc64be, and other big endian platforms #71211
  • Fix l3 cache macro #71209
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Replace TarFileMode with UnixFileMode #71222
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix edge case of code heap initial request #71213
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • UnixFileMode: address remaining feedback. #71188
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Do not CSE constant operands for `GT_SIMD` vector constructors #71174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Make `hostfxr.h` actually valid C (missing `struct` tag). #71205
    area-Host, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-preview6] UnixFileMode backport #71199
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, ask-mode, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimization. Use Min/Max intrinsics if one of arguments is constant. #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Bring up PPC64 little endian #70734
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, arch-ppc64le
  • Disable hot/cold splitting on Unix NativeAOT #71168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: add ability to filter during collection #70937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interop.IOErrors: remove errorRewriter arg. #70652
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Simplify ServiceBase.ValidServiceName #71147
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • notify pin changes one by one #69963
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • #69800 disable failing test on android #71132
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/mono/wasm/debugger/BrowserDebugProxy #71181
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution, .NET
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on Unix x64 #70960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Spill all nodes multi-reg morphing does not handle #71127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix size check for objects in heap walk #71176
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Enable dynamic linking of ucrt for release runtime #71182
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update apphost error dialog text to put question last #71165
    area-Host
  • Update design docs to reflect our new marshaller design from partner feedback #71017
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Mirror Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client #71139
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • JIT: arm64 osr funclet frame probing #70916
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change SString::GetUTF8NoConvert to GetUTF8 that converts the SString #71101
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAny in HttpListener.HandleAuthentication #71137
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix Tar timestamp conversion from/to string and DateTimeOffset #71038
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Set NativeLib=Shared for classlib by default #70879
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Draft] Implement Tar async APIs #70574
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers #69767
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ARM64 - Allow double constants to CSE more often #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #70746
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Windows/Arm64: Use 8.1 atomic instructions for GC code #71169
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement `Marshal.Get(Last)PInvokeErrorMessage()` APIs. #70685
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable AES encryption on Browser WASM #70915
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Using /unicode when running ildasm.exe roundtrip tests #71163
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Generalize init block morphing a little #70899
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Allow more permissive forward subbing into call arguments #71161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [iOS][Android] Fix crash in Exception.CaptureDispatchState #71171
    Servicing-approved, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.8
  • Optimize `HashCode.AddBytes` for inputs larger than 16 bytes. #70095
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Adjust regions range dynamically based on memory limits #71164
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "supportsDebuggerProperties" from DAP #71148
    area-Debugger-mono
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support long pdata unwinding and save_next for floating point regs in ARM64 #69906
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Add MessageChannel between browser thread and new pthreads #70908
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • Annotate collections.specialized to be native aot compatible #71159
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • tier0/R2R -> instrumented tier0 -> optimized tier1 #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • 53095 enable diagnostics test #71058
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Add a minimal version of gsharedvt for llvmonly, enabled… #70867
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Bring Enum.InternalBoxEnum to C# (CoreCLR) #70181
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support `PUTARG_SPLIT(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on ARM/64 #70861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` on the LHS of block copies #70782
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve and simplify `MakeTmpArgNode` #71019
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    community-contribution
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move macOS remote unwinding to libunwind directory #69720
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Trying to remove a int to int cast in lowering #70756
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Future

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't reference Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.Ref for C++/CLI projects #26203
  • AXIMP doesn't work correctly with ActiverX exe servers #26190

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert to token-per-line response file handling #26204
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-CLI, cli-ux

Merged

  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 7.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/CrossTargeting/NetStandardAndNetCoreApp #26163
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 11.0.2 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/ComServerWithDependencies #26172
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump NewtonSoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/MultiDependentProject #26173
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26177
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Not generate deps and config file for native aot apps #26175
    Area-ILLink

Updated

  • Allow Opt-In to change the default to Release for Pack/Pub #25991
    Area-NetSDK
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/KitchenSink/TestLibrary #26162
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • add rules to catch addition or removal of 'virtual' modifier #25734
    Area-Compatibility
  • Bump NewtonSoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/NewtonSoftDependentProject #26171
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/CompilationContext/TestApp #26164
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/SimpleDependencies #26165
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #25854
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the RID target from lower Linux to the latest one #25909
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong behavior of compiling for functions with nullable string return when nullable is enabled #62115
  • 'Converted to interpolated string' supports InvariantCulture #62111
  • Create Implementation Shortcut in right menu for Interface #62110
  • Integration tests should clearly indicate "failure to save" #62109
  • c# improve error messages UI #62108
  • Quick Refactoring - Introduce Parameter Object #62106
  • Diagnostics Inline: Show Hints, Suggestions, Refactorings, Spelling Errors #62105
  • Close release branches when official build is failing #62099
    Compiler.Next
  • Allow ref field of the containing type #62098
  • Various diagnostics that reference parameters do not include the parameter name #62096
  • References within `out` parameter should not be considered as potentially escaping #62094
  • "Implement abstract class" should add "where T : default" when a parameter is covariant in T? #62092
  • Redundant recompilation of source code due to file path case sensitivity. #62097

Closed

  • Intellisense should display construction hints for aggregate initiliazer #62107
  • further simplification of switch() syntax c# #62112

PullRequests

Created

  • Verify files are saved after a save operation #62117
    Area-IDE
  • Reuse incremental states from prior runs if they are unchanged #62116
    Area-Compilers
  • Support switch expression in CompleteStatementHandler #62114
    Area-IDE
  • Allow `delegate*<...>? ` to be scanned/parsed and add diagnostic to binder #62104
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix top-level activation for Move Static Members #62103
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Give member refactoring tools consistent field selection #62102
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Issue/50181 #62101
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid intermediary array allocation in incremental generator #62100
    Area-Compilers
  • testing out caching common binary assets #62095
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Minor lazy diagnostic info refactoring #62091
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Updated

  • Add members to PythiaCompletionProviderBase to move IntelliCode off internal APIs #62118
    Area-IDE
  • Add elastic space in IDE0063 codefix #59383
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid intermediary allocation in Incremental Driver #62089
    Area-Compilers
  • Assert diagnostics pass correct number of arguments #59419
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61869
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61943
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • Add correctness check that only runs analyzers #62035
    Area-IDE
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust spec quotes in ConversionBase.AddTypesParticipatingInUserDefinedConversion to incorporate abstract statics in interfaces #62076
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Address comments referencing work items in features/ref-fields #62088
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix NRE in VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider #62075
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update tests to reflect BCL behavior changes #61456
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid cascading diagnostics on error base type #62087
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert 61669 62019 #62081
    Area-IDE
  • New hot reload interfaces #60219
    Area-Interactive
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements in VB #61569
    Area-Compilers
  • Standardize references to the UTF-8 term in code and comments/documentation #62074
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Use VisualStudioWorkspaceImpl to perform navigation for Inheritance margin #62053
    Area-IDE
  • Add `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` to `EqualityContract` property #61993
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add new line before 'where' constraints in Quick Info #60545
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Don't load parts early from MEF that aren't needed #62090
    Area-IDE
  • Remove crash workaround in `.editorconfig` #60535
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Cleanup AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #60537
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Introduce variable rvalue fix #45918
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community
  • IOperation: expose information about the type parameter that is going to be used as the ".constrained" type for invoking abstract static methods #61811
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine ClientCertificate_Required_NotSent_AcceptedViaCallback #42389
  • Quarantine ClientCertificate_Allow_NotAvailable_Optional #42388
  • Quarantine ServerComparison.FunctionalTests.HelloWorldTests.ApplicationException #42380
  • [SignalR] Performance issue: SendAsync randomly slow #42376
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorServerManageurAccntPWD_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Update password" button is less than 3:1. #42373
    7.0-preview7
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorServerManageurAccntEmail_NonTextContrast: The color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Change email" button is less than 3:1. #42372
    7.0-preview7
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorServerManageurAccntProfile_NonTextContrast: The color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Save" button is less than 3:1. #42371
    7.0-preview7
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_ReactLogin_NonTextContrast: The color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Login" button and "Remember me" checkbox is less than 3:1. #42370
    7.0-preview7
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_ReactRegister_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Register" button is less than 3:1. #42369
    7.0-preview7
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularFetchData_AI4W: No main landmark is defined on the "Fetch Data" page #42368
    7.0-preview7
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularCounter_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Increment" button is less than 3:1. #42367
    7.0-preview7
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularCounter_AI4W: No main landmark is defined on the "Counter" page #42366
    7.0-preview7
  • ANCM PostStartCheck Failure #42363
  • Incorrect role type provided to the "Delete" button as link. #42362
  • Two scroll bars appear at 400% zoom on the page. #42361
  • Comment issue #42360

Closed

  • [Trimming] Request Decompression Middleware #41721
    7.0-preview6
  • Xamarin Android & Websockets #41835
  • DotNetStreamReference could not be found #42340
  • If-Modified-Since header is missing for most Accept header values #42082
  • Connection disconnected with error 'Error: Server returned handshake error: Handshake was canceled.;Server returned handshake error: Handshake was canceled.;No Connection with that ID: Status code '404' (anonymous) @ chat.js:36 Promise.catch (async) (anonymous) @ chat.js:35 #42107
  • Introduce package for rendering Blazor components with custom HTML elements #42329
    7.0-preview7
  • Productize the custom elements support package #38447
    7.0-preview7
  • Publishing a Razor Class Library (or Class Library) can include extraneous static content #42374
    Discussions
  • Productionize ClientAssets #40572
    Backlog
  • [Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect] handle callback called with GET Verb #42297

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantining failing HTTP3 tests #42390
    area-runtime
  • Missing checked in code for templates #42386
    area-mvc
  • Introducing `I*HttpResult` interfaces #42385
    area-runtime
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
  • [release/7.0-preview6] Backport custom HTML elements rendering Blazor components #42383
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Backwards tab navigation cannot move focus away from a Windows Forms BlazorWebView #8293
  • The margin between the mark and content of the radio button is too narrow. #8291
  • Rendering problem with FlexLayout / BindableLayout when insert/remove to binded collection #8289
  • .net 7 preview workaround: .net 6.0.300 might not be installed when VS preview is installed, the wiki needs to be fixed. #8288
  • Aot compilation fail when publishing for iOS #8286
  • MainActivity ScreenOrientation = ScreenOrientation.SensorPortrait #8284
  • Question: Customizable Shell TabBar Tab icon (Android + iOS) #8283
  • Control with ControlTemplate not showing in page #8281
  • Maui Blazor image cache is not working #8279
  • [Android] AutomationId still does not work #8277
  • WebView not displaying Leaflet map on Android #8276
  • Attempting to run on iOS device gets doesn't have a target for 'net6.0-ios/ios-arm64' error #8272
  • VisualElement.InvalidateMeasure not work at Android after update VisualStudio to 17.3.0 preview2 #8270
  • Entry as plain text if IsPassword="True" and IsReadOnly="True" #8267
  • Flyout Navigation: Android Toolbar disappears if we close app (via Back button) and re-open it. #8266
    6.0-sr3
  • Android Picker Issue (User can input text) #8265

Closed

  • Unable to navigate to ModalPage #8274
  • AppShell Flyout Content Missing #6061
    6.0-sr2
  • The NavBar is present in Modal page #8275
  • Rendering is not visible before rebuilding the entire control #7639

  • CheckBox.Color #734
    .NET 7
  • Entry.PlaceholderColor #733
    .NET 7
  • Entry.TextColor #731
    .NET 7
  • Label.TextColor #730
    .NET 7
  • MAUI Referencing .NET Standard 2.0 NUGet package throws System.BadImageFormatException when starting application #8079
  • Having trouble getting started #7762
  • MAUI - XAML - Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #8249
  • CollectionView - slow scrolling, laggy performance #8012
  • On Android, Setting StringContent to HttpRequestMessage, make "GET" request become "POST" request. #8199
  • Pointer pressed not received in panel when using scroll view in windows #8046
  • [Bug] VerticalStackLayout doesn't size #1405
    6.0-servicing
  • Use of ContentPresenter in a ControlTemplate will cause app to exit on Windows but not Android #7278
    6.0-sr2

PullRequests

Created

    t/bug, area/animation 🎬, fatal
  • [Android] Fix crash using Shadows on ListView ViewCell #8269
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, fatal, area/ListView, 6.0-sr3

Merged

    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • [Windows] Fix rendering GraphicsView rendering issue on Windows #8192

  • Make sure the templates support --framework #8282
    blocker, area/templates 📄, 6.0-sr2
  • [layout] avoid IView[] creation in LayoutExtensions #8250

  • [iOS] Fix BackgroundColor property issue on SearchBar #7794

  • [Android] Fix issue clipping ImageButton #7724
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue using DynamicResource TextColor on Label FormattedString #7793

  • Measure Images in FlexLayout at full size #8216
